product_name: Novara Miss Carema Gel Bike Skort
long_description: The Novara Miss Carema gel bike skort keeps you comfortable on the bike with performance features, and they offer plenty of style when you're walking around town. 4-way stretch polyester/spandex blend skirt has a wrap-around design and deep side slits offering a full range of motion. The moisture-wicking, quick-drying shorts have a 4-way stretch fabric. Liners resist pilling and snagging. Women-specific, gel chamois conforms to body contours; a top layer of breathable foam and a bottom layer of thin, resilient foam enhances comfort on the bike. Full coverage chamois features a perforated gel pad to cushion while also breathing; microfiber cover wicks moisture away. Cushy gel pad dissipates shock and reduces skin irritation by forming a fluid barrier between the hard saddle shell and the cyclist. Ultrasoft, breathable chamois is fully elasticized for added flex and stretch. Yoga-inspired 2 in. waistband features crossover stretch fabric in front to enhance comfort while tucked over the bike. Envelope-style pocket on bike shorts stores keys, cash or energy gel. Silicone grippers at leg hems keep shorts from riding up. Skirt outseam length is 13.5 in. (excluding waistband). With a UPF 50+ rating, The Novara Miss Carema gel bike skort provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
short_description: The Novara Miss Carema gel bike skort keeps you comfortable on the bike with performance features, and they offer plenty of style when you're walking around town.
